comments.body:
Suggest to add -- "Your development workstation needs to have at least 8GB or RAM."  or something similar.

Attempt to run on lesser machines is the NUMBER ONE problem we see annually with GSoC students attempting to "ramp up" -  easily hundreds of cases.   Making it explicit here will make it less painful for many to come.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@
Rocket.Chat runs on top of [Meteor](https://www.meteor.com/). To run it on development mode you need to [install Meteor](https://www.meteor.com/install) and clone/download the Rocket.Chat's code, then just open the code folder and run:
```shell
meteor npm install && meteor
```
